entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 03:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or periods of rain beginning early in the morning then changing to periods of rain in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the evening then cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
